input_text:
Job Title: Structural Design Engineer

Location: Columbia, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

Industry leader seeks a Structural Design Engineer to participate in building design. You should have a BS Civil Engineering and an SE or PE (or be within 1-2 yrs of obtaining). This is a financially strong company and a great place to work. Competitive benefits, relocation assistance, and real opportunity for growth. strong company culture with low turnover. Hybrid work schedule: 3 days in the office, 2 days remote!

location: Columbia, South Carolina

job type: Permanent

salary: $85,000 - 130,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 5pm

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

Generate designs Design projects with accuracy and within given timeframes Manage projects through effective communication and documentation with leadership, customers, and teammates Check and seal the work of teammates; ask for checking and sealing of your work from teammates Assist in project meetings, estimating, and R&D as requested

Requirements

BS Civil or Structural Engineering required EIT (Engineer In Training certification) required 2+ years' structural experience required strong communication skills, team player mindset, and leadership abilities

Qualifications

Experience level: Entry LevelMinimum 3 years of experienceEducation: Bachelors (required)

Skills

BS Civil EngineeringEITEngineer in TrainingProfessional EngineerPEStructuralStructural designBuilding design

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
